title: Clouds
description: The narrator watches the clouds as they change shape and take on forms. The clouds grow bigger and darker until the rain comes and the narrator decides to go inside.
highFrequencyWords: a, do, I, look, see, the, what, you
reviewWords: blue, creamy, darker, fuzzy, jumbo, puffy, round, sky, tall, thick
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
wordWork: High-Frequency Words                : Read and use high-frequency words
